'''September, 06 2007 meeting Minutes'''

'''Weekly Meeting of the New Mexico Ubuntu LoCo'''

'''Members Present''' 
* David Thomas dthomasdigital
* Eric Kriger gcleric
* uuwsley
* yggdrasil

 Others from other LoCo's stopped by too
* DrMo
* Palintlers

'''Others Present'''
* some lurkers but no one chimed in

'''Proceedings'''

Meeting called to order at 8:00pm by Member David Thomas

'''Topics Discussed''' 

The meetings are getting busy we actually started the talks around 7:30pm, topics ranged from the Nokia N800 to applications that will let you bulk rename MP3's and check for duplicates. It was brought up that a power strip or two should be brought to the release party on October 18th. We discussed the upcoming software freedom day, as well as showed uuwsley and yggdrasil how to sign up for the mailing list and New Mexico LoCo.

DrMo stpped by to talk about the shinny new Ubuntu case badges we can order.

Meeting adjourned 9:45pm

'''Assessment of Meeting'''

The meeting was one of our best, nice to see more activity.

Meeting minutes submitted by David Thomas
